column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I came here on a Friday night with my family for dinner and the restaurant was PACKED. I definitely recommend making reservations ahead of time. We were super hungry when we got there so we started ordering haphazardly. However
column2: we totally missed out on the paella (it takes about 30 minutes to make and we were halfway through our meal before we made that realization). Don't forget to check-in on Yelp--you get a free dessert tapa. :D
